#include <iostream>
    #include <map>
    #include <string>
    using namespace std;

    map<string, int> f, g;
    string part[1000];
    int poi[1000], n;

    int i, m = 0;

    int main() {
        cin >> n;
        for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) cin >> part[i] >> poi[i], f[part[i]] += poi[i];

        for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
        if (m < f[part[i]]) m = f[part[i]];
        for (i = 0; f[part[i]] < m || (g[part[i]] += poi[i]) < m; ++i);

        cout << part[i];
        return 0;
    }
